mapper.select: select r.no, r.user_no userNo, u.name r.title, r.content, r.hit, r.to_char(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate, r.group_no groupNo, r.order_no orderNo, r.depth from rboard r, users u where r.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc

select r.no, r.user_no userNo, u.name r.title, r.content, r.hit, r.to_char(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate, r.group_no groupNo, r.order_no orderNo, r.depth from rboard r, users u where r.user_no = u.no and r.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update rboard set order_no = order_no+1, depth = depth+1 where group_no = #{no}
